titles.title: Cigarette Promotional Product Labeling Act
A bill to require that promotional products for cigarettes bear labels warning the public of the health dangers associated with cigarette smoking, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16215-16216)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Cigarette Promotional Product Labeling Act - Amends the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to require that promotional products for cigarettes carry one of four specified warnings of health dangers of smoking.
